## SequelizeCrudRepository.buildSequelizeIncludeFilter() method

Build Sequelize compatible `include` filter

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected buildSequelizeIncludeFilter(inclusionFilters?: Array<InclusionFilter & {
        required?: boolean;
    }>, sourceModel?: ModelStatic<Model<T>>): Includeable[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  inclusionFilters | Array&lt;[InclusionFilter](./filter.inclusionfilter.md) &amp; { required?: boolean; }&gt; | _(Optional)_ loopback style <code>where</code> condition |
|  sourceModel | ModelStatic&lt;Model&lt;T&gt;&gt; | _(Optional)_ sequelize model instance |

**Returns:**

Includeable\[\]
